meanings.definition: To allow someone to enter a place or organization again after they have been banned or removed.
meanings.sent1: The school readmitted the student after he apologized for his mistake.
meanings.sent2: After serving his suspension, he was readmitted to the club.
meanings.sent3: The library readmitted the book that was mistakenly marked as lost.
meanings.sent4: The prodigal son was readmitted into the family with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The hospital readmitted the patient for further treatment.

meanings.definition: To be accepted back into a group or organization after being removed or excluded.
meanings.sent1: She was readmitted to the team after proving her dedication.
meanings.sent2: The soldier was readmitted to the army after recovering from his injury.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed to be readmitted into the house after sneaking out.
meanings.sent4: The lost member was readmitted to the group, completing the circle.
meanings.sent5: The student was readmitted to the study group for the upcoming exam.
